title: Ride-sharing receipts (Uber, Lyft, taxi)
dataVerified: Rider name, driver, pickup/dropoff, route, fare, tip, payment method
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake ride receipts (expense fraud). Domain binding verifies platform (Uber, Lyft). Expense claim verification. Business mileage tax deduction. Prevents fare dispute fraud.
